text: Imitation of Life is a 1959 American romantic drama movie. It stars Lana Turner, John Gavin, Juanita Moore, Susan Kohner, and Sandra Dee. Douglas Sirk directed. The movie is based on a book by Fannie Hurst. It was produced by Ross Hunter and released by Universal Pictures. The movie tells the story of two women and their daughters over the years. == Other websites == * Category:1959 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:1950s English-language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Douglas Sirk Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Women's movies
title: Imitation of Life (1959 movie)
